import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Navbar from "../../components/Navbar"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Footer from "../../components/Footer"; import { useStoreState } from "easy-peasy"; const NewInvoice = () => { const [writingDirection, setWritingDirection] = useState("ltr"); const userLanguage = useStoreState((state) => state.userLanguage); const [services, setServices] = useState([]); const [products, setProducts] = useState([ { id: "asd654asd", name: "Shoes", }, { id: "asd654asd", name: "Shoes", }, { id: "asd654asd", name: "Shoes", }, ]); const customer = { name: "John", surname: "Doe", dependents: [ { customer_name: "James", customer_surname: "Doe" }, { customer_name: "Mark", customer_surname: "Doe" }, { customer_name: "Luke", customer_surname: "Doe" }, ], }; const invoice = { id: "asd654asd", quantity: 50, date: new Date(), products: [ { choice: "Butter", quantity: 55, price: 59.99, }, { choice: "Shoes", quantity: 55, price: 59.99, }, { choice: "Shoes", quantity: 55, price: 59.99, }, ], services: [ { id: "asd654asd", choice: "Tailoring", price: 29.99, quantity: 3, }, { id: "asd654asd", choice: "Tailoring", price: 29.99, quantity: 3, }, { id: "asd654asd", choice: "Tailoring", price: 29.99, quantity: 3, }, ], dependents: [ { customer_name: "James" }, { customer_name: "Mark" }, { customer_name: "Luke" }, ], }; useEffect(() => { document.title = "New Invoice - Khamco Shop"; const determineWritingDirection = () => { if (userLanguage === "ar" || userLanguage === "ur") { setWritingDirection("rtl"); } }; determineWritingDirection(); }, []); return ( <>
Invoices

New Invoice for {customer.name}

{invoice.products && invoice.products.map((product) => ( ))} {invoice.services && invoice.services.map((service) => ( ))} {invoice.dependents && invoice.dependents.map((dependent) => ( ))}
Item Quantity Available Price/Unit Total Price
{product.quantity} KWD {new Intl.NumberFormat("en-US").format( product.quantity * product.price )}
Total Invoice
Customer Details {customer.name} {customer.surname}
Company Date
Khamco
); }; export default NewInvoice;
